Bidder 4.120: Let Go of Less Profitable Items: If the bidding price starts to exceed your estimated value, especially for lower-valued items, it might be better to let them go and focus on more profitable opportunities.
Bidder 4.121: Avoid Winning Too Many Items: Winning too many items could lead to overspending and lower overall profits. Strive to win the most profitable items, even if it means winning fewer items overall.
Bidder 4.122: Re-evaluate Estimated Values: Reassess your estimated values for the remaining items as the auction progresses. If your estimated value for an item is lower than its current bid price, it might be better to withdraw and focus on more profitable opportunities.
